children.name: according
children.sourceText: If ye have the power of God deliver yourselves from these bands, and then we will believe that the Lord will destroy this people according to your words.

children.name: answer
children.sourceText: Why do ye not answer the words of this people?

children.name: bands
children.sourceText: If ye have the power of God deliver yourselves from these bands, and then we will believe that the Lord will destroy this people according to your words.

children.name: be
children.sourceText: After what ye have seen, will ye preach again unto this people, that they shall be cast into a lake of fire and brimstone?

children.name: been
children.sourceText: Behold, ye see that ye had not power to save those who had been cast into the fire; neither has God saved them because they were of thy faith.

children.name: believe
children.sourceText: If ye have the power of God deliver yourselves from these bands, and then we will believe that the Lord will destroy this people according to your words.
